archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0177
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a product owner, I want to provide compelling roaming packages that are charged in minutes, daily or monthly depending on the country of origin/termination

properties.value: Depending on country or group of countries? group of countries. What kind of packages are expected? Zone packs i daily rates. Details to be discussed during the product sessions. Is a daily/monthly package limited somehow? Fair use policy? Yes, there will be limits

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
